By using the CUNow service you are agreeing to be bound by the following terms and conditions.
You are responsible for any activity that occurs under your screen name.
You are responsible for keeping your password secure.
Be respectful – maintain a friendly environment.
Do not post material that is inappropriate or that could reasonably be deemed defamatory, offensive or obscene.
Do not use these online spaces for illegal purposes or to breach any laws.

We reserve the right to remove comments and/or posts. We also reserve the right to restrict users who don’t follow these guidelines, have online pages containing offensive material and/content, or for any other reason.

You may not use the CUNow service for any illegal or unauthorized purpose. International users agree to comply with all local laws regarding online conduct and acceptable content.

We reserve the right to modify or terminate the CUNow service for any reason, without notice at any time.

We reserve the right to alter these Terms of Use at any time. If the alterations constitute a material change to the Terms of Use, we will notify you via internet mail according to the preference expressed on your account. What constitutes a (material change) will be determined at our sole discretion, in good faith and using common sense and reasonable judgement.
We reserve the right to refuse service to anyone for any reason at any time.

CUnow's terms state they will not rent or sell a user’s information without consent, but may share non-personal information with third-party organizations, service providers, affiliates, and advertising partners that help CUnow provide the service.

CUnow's terms state that they may combine a user’s information with other information and share de-identified and aggregated information with third-parties. CUnow may display advertisements and promotions on the service.

In addition, CUnow's terms describe that a person's distinct mobile device identifier and other device-specific information may be collected and stored. This distinct identifier could be used by CUnow or third party affiliates to track and target content and advertising to users.

CUnow's terms state they use commercially reasonable safeguards to help secure a user's information collected through the service. The terms also state that CUnow takes reasonable steps to verify a user's identity before granting them access to an account. However, the policies do not clearly indicate whether or not a user's data is encrypted while in transit or at rest. CUnow's terms also do not disclose how they would notify users in the event of a data breach.

You will not share your account or password with anyone, and you must protect the security of your account and your password. You’re responsible for notifying us of any unauthorized use. You’re responsible for any activity associated with your account.
You may not post sexually suggestive photos.

CUnow's terms state it is a platform for users to post content, including photos, comments and other materials to the service and to share user content publicly. This means that other users may search, see, use, or share any user content that is posted and made publicly available through the service.

CUnow's terms state they provide social interactions between users who can post comments, likes or other messages on a user's content. These interactions include direct messages between individual users, and disappearing messages.
Any false, defamatory, libelous, abusive, threatening, racially offensive, sexually explicit, obscene, harmful, vulgar, hateful, illegal, or otherwise objectionable content;

Any content that personally attacks an individual whose identity can be easily learned from what you post (An example of a personal attack is posting negative comments about an individual in a way meant to demean that person. Note that posting your opinion about someone’s ideas or actions is not a personal attack);
